verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> now these אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָחֲל֥וּ <WH5157> inherited בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And these [are the countries] which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִֽחֲל֜וּ <WH5157> distributed for inheritance אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <WH499> which Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> and Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֔וּן <WH5126> of Nun וְרָאשֵׁ֛י <WH7218> and the heads אֲב֥וֹת <WH1> of the fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

בְּגוֹרַ֖ל <WH1486> By lot נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <WH5159> [was] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> as the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> of Moses לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <WH8672> for the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> and [for] the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <WH4294> tribe

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> had given מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> For Moses נַחֲלַ֨ת <WH5159> the inheritance שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> of two הַמַּטּוֹת֙ <WH4294> tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> and an half הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <WH4294> tribe מֵעֵ֖בֶר <WH5676> on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> Jordan וְלַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> but unto the Levites לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> he gave נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> none inheritance בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <WH8432> among

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָי֧וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> For the children יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> of Joseph שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> were two מַטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> tribes מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <WH4519> Manasseh וְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> and Ephraim וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not נָתְנוּ֩ <WH5414> therefore they gave חֵ֨לֶק <WH2506> no part לַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> unto the Levites בָּאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> in the land כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo עָרִים֙ <WH5892> save cities לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <WH3427> to dwell וּמִ֨גְרְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH4054> [in] with their suburbs לְמִקְנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4735> for their cattle וּלְקִנְיָנָֽם׃ <WH7075> and for their substance

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> As the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> Thus עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> did בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> so the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיַּחְלְק֖וּ <WH2505> and they divided אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land פ

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <WH5066> came בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Then the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> of Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> unto Joshua בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <WH1537> in Gilgal וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> and כָּלֵ֥ב <WH3612> and Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <WH3312> of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּ֑י <WH7074> the Kenezite אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You יָדַ֡עְתָּ <WH3045> unto him Thou knowest אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָר֩ <WH1697> the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3069> God אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto Moses אִישׁ־ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> of God עַ֧ל <WH5921> and אֹדוֹתַ֛י <WH182> concerning me וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> and אֹדוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH182> and thee בְּקָדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <WH6947> in Kadeshbarnea

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <WH705> Forty שָׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> years אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I בִּ֠שְׁלֹחַ <WH7971> sent מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> [was] I when Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֹתִ֛י <WH853> מִקָּדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵ֖עַ <WH6947> me from Kadeshbarnea לְרַגֵּ֣ל <WH7270> to espy out אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וָאָשֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> again אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> him word כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after עִם־ <WH5973> as in לְבָבִֽי׃ <WH3824> as [it was] in mine heart

וְאַחַי֙ <WH251> Nevertheless my brethren אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עָל֣וּ <WH5927> that went up עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with הִמְסִ֖יו <WH4529> melt אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֣ב <WH3820> with me made the heart הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people וְאָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I מִלֵּ֔אתִי <WH4390> but I wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> followed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֣ע <WH7650> sware מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַהוּא֮ <WH1931> he לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> not הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> Surely the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דָּרְכָ֤ה <WH1869> have trodden רַגְלְךָ֙ <WH7272> whereon thy feet בָּ֔הּ לְךָ֨ תִֽהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> become לְנַחֲלָ֛ה <WH5159> shall be thine inheritance וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> and thy children's עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever כִּ֣י <WH3588> because מִלֵּ֔אתָ <WH4390> because thou hast wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> followed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> my God

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> behold הֶחֱיָ֨ה <WH2421> hath kept me alive יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> And now behold the LORD אוֹתִי֮ <WH853> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> when דִּבֵּר֒ <WH1696> as he said זֶה֩ <WH2088> these אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <WH705> these forty וְחָמֵ֜שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> years מֵ֠אָז <WH227> even since דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> this word הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> when הָלַ֥ךְ <WH1980> wandered יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> while [the children of] Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> and now הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> and now lo I [am] this day בֶּן־ <WH1121> old חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <WH8084> fourscore שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years

עוֹדֶ֨נִּי <WH5750> I am still הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> this day חָזָ֗ק <WH2389> As yet I [am as] strong כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> I בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> as [I was] in the day שְׁלֹ֤חַ <WH7971> sent אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> that Moses כְּכֹ֥חִי <WH3581> me as my strength אָ֖ז <WH227> was then וּכְכֹ֣חִי <WH3581> [was] then even so [is] my strength עָ֑תָּה <WH6258> is now לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> now for war וְלָצֵ֥את <WH3318> both to go out וְלָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> and to come in

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now תְּנָה־ <WH5414> Now therefore give לִּי֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָ֣ר <WH2022> me this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> whereof the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> he כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אַתָּֽה־ <WH859> you שָׁמַעְתָּ֩ <WH8085> for thou heardest בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that עֲנָקִ֣ים <WH6062> how the Anakims שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there וְעָרִים֙ <WH5892> [were] there and [that] the cities גְּדֹל֣וֹת <WH1419> [were] great בְּצֻר֔וֹת <WH1219> [and] fenced אוּלַ֨י <WH194> if so be יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אוֹתִי֙ <WH854> [will be] with וְה֣וֹרַשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH3423> me then I shall be able to drive them out כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> as the LORD

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <WH1288> blessed יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> And Joshua וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> him and gave אֶת־ <WH853> חֶבְר֛וֹן <WH2275> Hebron לְכָלֵ֥ב <WH3612> unto Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <WH3312> of Jephunneh לְנַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> for an inheritance

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> after that הָיְתָֽה־ <WH1961> became חֶ֠בְרוֹן <WH2275> Hebron לְכָלֵ֨ב <WH3612> of Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּ֤ה <WH3312> of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּי֙ <WH7074> the Kenezite לְֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> therefore became the inheritance עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this יַ֚עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after מִלֵּ֔א <WH4390> because that he wholly אַחֲרֵ֕י <WH310> followed יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְשֵׁ֨ם <WH8034> And the name חֶבְר֤וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron לְפָנִים֙ <WH6440> before קִרְיַ֣ת אַרְבַּ֔ע <WH7153> [was] Kirjatharba הָאָדָ֧ם <WH120> man הַגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> [which Arba was] a great בָּעֲנָקִ֖ים <WH6062> among the Anakims ה֑וּא <WH1931> he וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> And the land שָׁקְטָ֖ה <WH8252> had rest מִמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> from war פ
